body:
Once the Hub or servers / gamemodes go down and the Avicus Staff finds out about it ( or before if they know ) Should the Avicus staff post a courtesy thread on the  forums?

Who Thinks we should get an Official post ( courtesy) when the Hub server or other servers go down? Letting us know what is wrong if they know? Or letting us know if its the Mojang servers without us having to go to : http://xpaw.ru/mcstatus/

Or

Should we not get them to post anything on the forums, as it is not really needed, and just wait until it comes back online.

Post:
Yes: Update -  We like to know whats going on!
No: Forums Do not need a Server Update Thread
